title: Multigit File Format
description: The format exported by Multigit to describe a list of repositories and their status

fileFormatVersion.description: The version of the file format used

description.description: Description of the multigit file content

url.description: URL of the project (https or ssh). Username shall be exlucded from the URL

head.description: On what commit does the head point. This is either a branch name, a tag name or a commit SHA

head_type.description: What is 'head' describing: a branch, a tag or a commit ?

destination.description: Target directory relative to the base directory, using \ as separators
